title: Why was I banned? Where can I find out why? Never recieved disciplinary action before.
body: Just want to know how I can figure out the reason for my ban.

replies.body: I checked up on your account and it seems like there was some rather suspicious activity going on. Reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for the full context and see what can be done.

If worse comes to worse I will just pay the JAMS fee and come up with an argument as a matter of principle. My wife and I worked our tails off to both get to Gold this season. I Re-read the Terms of Use and did some research on Westlaw (I personally think this whole virtual property thing is nuts). I will just exhaust whatever support appeals exist and then move forward from there.

Thank you, I figured out I used my old E-Mail for the account and saw the E-Mail. I made a more recent post and a ticket explaining what went on. This whole thing has been a fear of mine because of my constant travel for quite some time. I made a post several years ago expressing my fear of this current situation. 

I am thinking about avoiding ranked in the future because of this. The very nature of my life requires I travel between countries and states on a regular basis and I play on my laptop. I think if I was not playing ranked this would never have been an issue in the first place but the fact that I finally hit Gold just triggered it.
